item.description:
Boston Digital Arts is returning to Wheeler's this month for our second portfolio night. Our first portfolio night last spring was a great opportunities for our new members to meet, and there has been a lot of interest in repeating the event. Join other fantastically creative Boston artists for a night of sharing graphic design, digital photography, interactive/web, video, animation, beverages, and tasty ice cream.

We will not have a projector, so please bring prints or a laptop. We should have wi-fi access, if you want to show your online portfolio on my laptop. If you would like to share your work, please note this in your RSVP comment.

Our group includes many incredibly talented artists and I look forward to seeing everyone's work!

group.name: The Boston Digital Arts Meetup Group

item.name: Portfolio Night II: Rescheduled
